title: Class Exercises - Activity 1
description: Practice exercises for the first module.

exercises.title: Exercise 1 - Identifying the need for articles
exercises.description: Write the correct article ('a', 'an', or 'the'). If no article is needed, write 'nothing'.

questions.question: The old woman made a special tea with _____ herb that smelled of oranges.
Through his telescope we could see what looked like canals on _____ Mars.
The children were released from _____ school early last Friday because of a teachers’ conference.
Robin Hood supposedly stole from _____ rich.
_____ untold number of people perished while attempting to cross Death Valley.
Albert is _____ only actor that I know personally.

exercises.title: Exercise 2 - Checking articles
exercises.description: If the underlined article is used incorrectly, cross it out and choose the correct item.

questions.question: Countless tourists will be thronging to the Greek islands.
The tomato originated in Central America.
The steam engine was developed in an eighteenth century.
A hour passed before the rescue ship arrived.
The Russia has a very diverse culture.
A university education is one of the requirements for the position.
The doctor refrained from giving him an advice.

exercises.title: Exercise 3 - Checking nouns
exercises.description: Look at the underlined nouns in each sentence. Circle the noun that is incorrect.

questions.question: During the ten years he was a politic, his policies changed drastically.
Joe insisted that his success was due to motivated rather than brilliance.
Scientists have managed to clone that kind of protein genes, but only as an exercise in basic research.
The most renowned of America’s metalworker, Samuel Yellin, designed the ironwork for the New York Federal Reserve Bank.
The childrens were counting the toys and candy they had collected during the festivities.
On the outskirts of the town, calf are frequently seen grazing in the meadows.
The police officer gave some advices on crime prevention at the community meeting.
One series of grammar book that was used in the experimental class was written by the students themselves.
